content: Remove turbo: false from account setup form as it's unnecessary (shipstar comment)
Convert feature specs to request specs and move controller specs to request specs
Address security concern about backdoor to PHI access - needs compliance review (shipstar comment)
Consider adding Auth0 API failure test scenario (Claude suggestion)
Add session timeout test case (Claude suggestion)
Fix appointment-based expiration - should expire AFTER appointment, not at beginning of day (shipstar)
Remove local: true from form - should use standard Rails form submission (shipstar)
Move tests from separate _additional_spec.rb file to their respective existing spec files (shipstar)
Fix SquarePaymentMethod#title method to handle nil brand/last4 values
Update model specs to expect nil for incomplete payment data
Update controller specs to handle nil title scenarios
Update controller logic to handle nil payment method titles
Run the specs to verify the changes work correctly
